Description: Rim and body sherd of North Ionian (?) pottery bird bowl; interior: glazed with red band lined in white near top; exterior: upper part of rim glazed; part of bird to right and rosette in silhouette; below, two thin boundary lines and part of a band. Inscription over frieze.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 311)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 669, no. 272)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.072)
